targets.query:
from(bucket: "vevantzedata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stocks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["district"] =~ /${District:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["playthrough_id"] =~ /${Playthrough:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["faction"] =~ /${Faction:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["map"] =~ /${Map:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["settlement"] =~ /${Settlement:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

foodPerDay = 2.4
waterPerDay = 2.0

food = from(bucket: "vevantzedata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stocks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["district"] =~ /${District:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["playthrough_id"] =~ /${Playthrough:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["faction"] =~ /${Faction:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["map"] =~ /${Map:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["settlement"] =~ /${Settlement:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Bread" or r._field == "GrilledPotato" or r._field == "Carrot" or r._field == "Berries" or r._field == "Water")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with TotalFood: r.Bread + r.GrilledPotato + r.Carrot + r.Berries}))
  |> keep(columns: ["TotalFood", "Water", "_time"])

pops = from(bucket: "vevantzedata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pops")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["district"] =~ /${District:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["playthrough_id"] =~ /${Playthrough:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["faction"] =~ /${Faction:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["settlement"] =~ /${Settlement:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "adults" or r._field == "kits")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with TotalPops: r.adults + r.kits}))
  |> keep(columns: ["TotalPops", "_time"])

join(tables: {food: food, pops: pops}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with 
    Food: float(v: r.TotalFood) / float(v: r.TotalPops) / foodPerDay, 
    Water: float(v: r.Water) / float(v: r.TotalPops) / waterPerDay
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false, column: "Food")
  |> keep(columns: ["Food", "Water", "_time"])

from(bucket: "vevantzedata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pops")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^(adults|kits)/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["district"] =~ /${District:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["playthrough_id"] =~ /${Playthrough:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["faction"] =~ /${Faction:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["map"] =~ /${Map:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["settlement"] =~ /${Settlement:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "vevantzedata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pops")
  |> group(columns: ["settlement"])
  |> distinct(column: "settlement")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.name: Settlement

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pops")

list.description: Unique ID for a playthrough. Usually unnecessary since settlement name was introduced, but still useful when renaming settlements
list.name: Playthrough
list.query:
from(bucket: "vevantzedata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pops")
